name: Hell of an Office
description:
“Hell of an Office” is a first-person platforming game, where you play a frustrated office worker in HELL. Chased by rising hellfire, you must speedrun through 100 insane vertical levels, on your mission to escape the corporate underworld 😈



💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥

Hi there, *valued employee*! Welcome to “HellO” - the (under)world’s hottest stationary supply company. Your desk is this way. Watch out for the Boss. He can be a real Devil...

💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥 💼 🔥

Your soul-sucking office job in Hell...well, sucks. It’s time to get the &£%$ outta this hellhole! And you’re taking your god-damned stapler with you...

To escape, you’ll need to ascend a demonic office tower in ruins - tackling 100 fiery levels that’ll put your reflexes to the test!



Leap across crumbling platforms. Race the rising hellfire. Punch physics in the face with gravity-defying portals & wind-tunnels...And wield the power of your trusty stapler to dash, hook, & rocket jump your way to freedom! 🔥


  • Nerve-rippingly responsive vertical platforming
  • Reach insane speeds with dash, hook, and rocket jump mechanics
  • Outrun the ever-rising hellfire
  • Send physics to hell with reality-shredding portals, wind-tunnels, & dissolving platforms
  • Compete on online leaderboards
  • 100 levels across 10 unique worlds
  • Adrenaline-pumping campaign mode that gets more and more evil
  • Sick as hell soundtrack that’ll have you rampaging through the levels
  • A stapler called “Mr. Stapley” who may or may not be your only friend ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄

🔥 AND REMEMBER...🔥
